Description: Top of the Hill in the Hillcrest Heights neighborhood in Temple Hills, MD offers big and bright studio, 1 and 2 bedrooms apartments. We’re at the center of everything you need. Very close to many bus, rail & highway transit options. MetroBus C12 stops here, one block to C14, H11 and H12, and a 10-minute walk to Naylor Rd. MetroRail station (green line). 5 minutes to Suitland Parkway and I-495/I-95. 10 minutes to I-295 and Andrews and Bolling Air Force Base. 15 minutes to DC, the Pentagon, the US Capitol or National Harbor. 5 minutes to Iverson Mall and Marlow Heights Shopping Center, as well as grocery stores and everyday shopping and services. 5 minutes to Hillcrest Heights Recreation Center. Apartment features include a large living area with space for lots of furniture, separate dining area, great storage, large covered balcony or patio, and natural light from large windows (we provide blinds throughout). Gas and electricity is included in your rent – you pay water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include two elevators in each building, large swimming pool with sundeck, trash chute room on each floor, mail delivery and huge central laundry in each building, on-site management office and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.livetopofthehill.com.

Parking:
Surface Lot
Unreserved spaces on our surface lots. Residents parked in our lots must display a current community issued permit at all times. Visitors may park anywhere on our surface lots from 6AM - 10PM, after which they must park in our designated spaces.

Description: Chestnut Hill in the Hillcrest Heights neighborhood of Temple Hills, MD offers spacious studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. We’re at the center of everything you need. Our apartments are close to Washington DC and Alexandria, VA, as well as public transit. The MetroBus C12 stops here and one block to P12, H1 & H2. 5 minutes to Naylor Road or Southern Avenue MetroRail stations (green line). 5 minutes to Suitland Parkway and 10 minutes to I-295 or I-495/I-95. Minutes to Iverson Mall and Marlow Heights Shopping Center. Only 10 minutes to Joint Bases Andrews and Bolling, the Pentagon, U.S. Capitol and National Harbor. We are moments to grocery stores, everyday shopping and services, and parks and recreation including Oxon Hill Stream Valley Park, Hillcrest Heights Recreation Center, and North Barnaby Splash Park. Apartment amenities include a large living space with room for lots of furniture, galley-style kitchen, natural light from large windows (we provide blinds throughout), views of green lawns or trees, and central heat and air conditioning, Utilities are not included in your rent – you pay for gas, electricity, and water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a relaxing pool with sundeck, two play areas, 21 laundries on-site and mail delivery inside each building, on-site management office and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.chestnuthillapts.com.

Description: Iverson Towers and Anton House located in the Hillcrest Heights neighborhood in Temple Hills, MD offers studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. We’re at the center of everything you need. Public transit as at your doorstep – MetroBus H11 and H12 stop at Iverson Towers and just 5 minutes to the Naylor Road MetroRail station (green line). 5-10 minutes to Suitland Parkway, I-495/I-95, I-295, Suitland Federal Center and Census Bureau. 15 minutes to the Pentagon, US Capitol, National Harbor, and Joint Base Bolling & Andrews Air Force Base. And in the neighborhood you’ll find great schools, grocery stores, shopping, parks and recreation. Apartment features include a large living area with room for lots of furniture, separate dining area, patio and balcony available in some apartments, wonderful natural light from large windows (we provide blinds throughout), and central heat & air conditioning. Gas and electricity are included in your rent – you pay water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a relaxing pool with sundeck at Iverson Towers for residents of both communities, welcoming lobbies, telephone entry system, big central laundry and mail delivery in each building, on-site management and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.iversontowers-antonhouse.com.

Description: At South Pointe Apartments, youll find comfort in your spacious apartment home and its park-like setting. Live at South Pointe Apartments and a world of convenience is just beyond your doorstep. Groceries are just five minutes away and the Beltway is closer than that. Shopping, dining, entertainment whatever youre up for, is right around the corner at Iverson Mall, Tanger Outlets and the ultimate destination of all: National Harbor. On the military side, Joint Bases Andrews and Anacostia-Bolling are an easy commute. And, thanks to the Southern Avenue and Naylor Road Metro stations being within walking distance, so is downtown DC. For comfort, convenience and that feeling that says youre home, these are the apartments in Temple Hills, MD for you.

Description: Forest Hill Apartments is a beautifully landscaped property just minutes from DC. Directly across the street from the United Medical Center, public transportation picks up and drops off on the property. Enjoy our selection of oversized one, two, and three-bedroom apartments, each floorplan is also available with an additional den. Wall-to-wall carpeting, and a mix of ceramic and vinyl tile complement the floors. We also offer dishwashers, gas ranges, and frost-free freezers, private balconies or patios available in every apartment, are just some of the benefits of living in our large park-like community. Beautiful on-site swimming pool available during the summer months. 24-hour maintenance with live operators for after-hours. Friendly and courteous staff.

A Lovely top floor unit with 2 bedrooms secured front entrance walk in closet full bath table space kitchen large living-dining area washer-dryer balcony assigned parking and extra storage in building. Minutes from Naylor Road & Suitland Subway Stations. Also minutes away from Tanger Outlets National Harbor and MGM... This will not last long. This Listing is for Sale.

Description:
(240) 338-1649 - Beautiful Updated 3BR/1BA SFH in Temple Hills, MD - The first floor has gorgeous newly refinished hardwood flooring throughout, a massive living room with decorative fireplace and a separate dining room. The first floor features a huge updated kitchen with tiled floors, custom tiled backsplash, updated cabinets and all appliances including gas stove and dishwasher. The 2nd floor has gorgeous matching hardwood flooring throughout 3 spacious bedrooms, all with ceiling fans and plenty of closet space as well as an updated bathroom with tiled floors, tiled shower enclosure and new fixtures. The house has an unfinished laundry/storage area with washer and dryer included that has great storage space. The house has spacious front and backyard for entertaining, updated light fixtures throughout, all new energy efficient vinyl windows, 3 car driveway, massive attic for storage and central air!
Pets considered on a case by case basis with an additional Pet Deposit!!
Contact Aaron at (240) 338-1649 for details or to schedule an appointment or email athompson@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
(RLNE3321645) Other Amenities - Other- hardwood floors, decorative fireplace, custom tiled floors, fully equipped kitchen, ceiling fans, voucher friendly. Appliances - Dishwasher, Air Conditioning, Range, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description: This garden style community offers free utilities and features one, two and three-bedroom apartments with spacious, light-filled rooms, large windows, abundant storage space and well-equipped kitchens. The heating and air conditioning is individually controlled and all utilities are included in the rent. Each apartment is within steps of conveniently located laundry facilities. The convenient Temple Hills, MD location is close to schools, parks, Marlow Heights Shopping Center, and restaurants and provides easy access to major metropolitan thoroughfares. A bus stop is just outside the community entrance and there is plenty of free parking on site.

Description: The choice is yours at Harbour Manor where we offer both classic and signature style apartments. While all of our homes offer spacious rooms, generous closets and either a private balcony or patio, our Signature Style apartments have recently been renovated with new appliances, cabinetry, flooring and fixtures. Harbour Manor offers an ideal location with easy access to I-295, the Beltway, The National Harbor, shopping and schools. Call today to schedule your personal tour!
